001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import androidx.room.Update;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
011import java.time.Instant;
012import java.util.List;
013
014@Dao
015public interface LocationDao {
016
017  String LOCATION_QUERY = "SELECT * FROM location";
018  String LOCATIONS_QUERY_FOR_SECURE = "SELECT * FROM location WHERE secure = :secure";
019  String LOCATIONS_QUERY_FOR_TRACKING = "SELECT * FROM location WHERE alert_id != null";
020  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL = "DELETE FROM location";
021  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_SECURE = "DELETE FROM location WHERE secure = true";
022  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_UNSECURE = "DELETE FROM location WHERE secure = false";
023  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_TRACKED = "DELETE FROM location WHERE alert_id != null";
024  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_SECURE = "DELETE FROM location WHERE location_id = :location_id AND secure = true";
025  String TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_UNSECURE = "DELETE FROM location WHERE location_id = :location_id AND secure = false";
026
027  @Insert
028  Single<Long> insert(Location location);
029  @Query(LOCATION_QUERY)
030  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocations();
031  @Query(LOCATIONS_QUERY_FOR_SECURE)
032  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocationsSecureOrUnsecure(boolean secure);
033  @Query(LOCATIONS_QUERY_FOR_TRACKING)
034  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocationsTracked();
035  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL)
036  Completable truncateLocations();
037  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_SECURE)
038  Completable truncateLocationsSecure();
039  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_UNSECURE)
040  Completable truncateLocationsUnsecure();
041  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ALL_TRACKED)
042  Completable truncateLocationsTracked();
043  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_SECURE)
044  Completable truncateLocationSecure(long location_id);
045  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY_ONE_UNSECURE)
046  Completable truncateLocationUnsecure(long location_id);
047}
